input:
Exercise: choose the most plausible alternative.

The driver turned on the car's headlights.  because... 
- He heard thunder.
- The sun went down.

Exercise: choose the most plausible alternative.

The detective revealed an anomaly in the case.  so... 
- He finalized his theory.
- He scrapped his theory.

- The rider stroked the horse.

Exercise: choose the most plausible alternative.

Political violence broke out in the nation.  so... 
- Many citizens relocated to the capitol.
- Many citizens took refuge in other territories.
target: many citizens took refuge in other territories.
pred: many citizens relocated to the capitol.
